frame.name: Isolated_places
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Place</fen> is located far off from centers of population, culture, and/or trade.
<ex>I'm from the <fex name="Place"><t>middle</t> </fex><fex name="Place"><t>of</t> </fex><fex name="Place"><t>nowhere</t></fex>, <fex name="Relative_location">California</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The town or area that is in a remote location.
<ex>He lives in the <fex name="Place"><t>backwoods</t></fex> of Canada.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Relative_location
FE.definition:
<def-root>A place with respect to which the <fen>Place</fen> is located.
<ex>I live in <t>Bumblefuck</t>, <fex name="Relative_location">Kansas</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: rimboe.n
lexUnit.definition: dat erg groot, ontoegankelijk, onoverzichtelijk en niet door mensen is aangetast
